name: The Unbreakable Chain
description:
Following the logic and scientific ideas such as the food chain and evolution, let's step into this drawing, have a walk around and see what there is to eat. Why are computer games so challenging? Who am I playing against? Why don't I play WITH the game, or just sit back and see what happens? Why am I competing with g*d?

This is a multi-genre masterpiece, featuring platforming, overhead adventure, and so much more. From the wild-minded creators of Re: Get To Schol On Time comes an adventure 5 MILLION years in the making! Can you run, jump, and evolve with the best of them, or will you Game Over and become an evolutionary dead end? It's time for a REVOLUTION - play it now!

"I love these artists/musicians and their filth brains" - Brandon Sheffield

Featuring a hard-hitting soundtrack by Yasushi Kaminishi, GHXYK2, and BankBank!
